Yandex Disk.name: F04b.01
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company publish data on the total number of accounts restricted for violating the company’s own rules?

Yandex Disk.name: F04b.02
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company publish data on the number of accounts restricted based on which rule was violated?

Yandex Disk.name: F04b.03
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company publish data on the number of accounts restricted based on the method used to identify the violation?

Yandex Disk.name: F04b.04
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company publish this data at least four times a year?

Yandex Disk.name: F04b.05
Yandex Disk.description: Can the data be exported as a structured data file?
